# TrackFast Telemetry
> Real-time telemetry for the TrackFast project.

## Primary Endpoints
- Live telemetry JSON: https://trackfast.fun/api/telemetry
- Data alias JSON: https://trackfast.fun/api/data
- OpenAPI schema: https://trackfast.fun/openapi.json
- Plain-text agent entry point: https://trackfast.fun/data

## Usage Notes
- Public GET reads are allowed.
- Write operations on `/api/telemetry` require auth cookie.
- Data is continuously updated.
